channel.title: [Req][Help] Server Creation
channel.description:
Hi, i Need a Server Thats 508+ And All It Has To Do Is:
1. Have A Working Client With It 2. Start At Clanwars 3. Pk Outsite Clanwars 4. Never loose items 5. Random Drops Upon death
So All It is, is That You Spawn At Clanwars Run out And Pk When You Die The Person That Pked You gets Random Drop And You Dont Loose Stuff And This Is repeated
Please All Help Would Be Appriciated...
